name: Construction Support
objective: To renovate existing research facilities and build new research facilities to meet basic and clinical space requirements, laboratory safety, biohazard containment, and animal care standards in order to support the facility demands of NIH research programs.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
rules_regulations: 42 CFR 52. NIH Grants Policy Statement, https://grants.nih.gov/policy/nihgps/index.htm. The PHS 398 may be obtained from NIH's Extramural Research Home Page: http://grants1.nih.gov/grants/oer.htm.
